app: 大华智能物联ICC综合管理平台
seo: 大华,ICC综合管理平台,fastjson,反序列化漏洞
summary: 检测大华智能物联ICC综合管理平台是否存在fastjson反序列化漏洞，通过构造特定的POST请求来验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: Detect whether the Dahua ICC Integrated Management Platform has fastjson deserialization vulnerability by constructing specific POST requests to verify the existence of the vulnerability.
